about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm an AI Product Engineer who loves building systems that make people smarter. After 10 years in software, including five as CTO, I've launched 50+ products from 0→1. I now design AI‑powered learning infrastructure at 2 Hour Learning, blending technical depth with product speed.

philosophy.title: What I Believe
philosophy.quote1: I believe great teams build fast because they trust deeply.
philosophy.quote2: I care about impact, clarity, and the craft of building.
philosophy.quote3: Work should feel like flow, not friction.

about.funFact: When I'm not building, I'm surfing, cycling, or splitboarding in the Andes.
